pageContext.title: Workset Creation for Scholarly Analysis Project
pageContext.description_excerpt: In collaboration with the HathiTrust Research Center (HTRC), MITH will develop a prototype application to facilitate the distributed correction and enhancement of HathiTrust metadata records.  This project is part of the HTRC's Workset Creation for Scholarly Analysis: Prototyping Project (WCSA), a two-year effort funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation which aims to engage scholars in designing tools for exploration, location, and analytic grouping of materials so they can routinely conduct computational scholarship at scale, based on meaningful worksets.
pageContext.participants: Ed Summers, Jennifer Wellman, Kirsten Keister, Nicholas Slaughter, Peter Mallios, Raffaele Viglianti, Rebecca Borden, Stephanie Sapienza, Trevor Muñoz
